items.sentence: She said that she would follow him no matter where he went.
I\'d like to discuss something of importance to both of us.
I\'ll just walk around Boston and see the sights by myself.
I can\'t count the number of times this has happened to me.
I thought it was strange that Tom wasn\'t at Mary\'s party.
Can you figure out why the boss is so unfriendly this week?
I\'m really impressed with the way Tom plays the saxophone.
I\'m sure Tom had to borrow money in order to pay his rent.
I\'m sure we can figure out a way to get this done on time.
It\'s amazing how little time Tom spends with his children.
